title: New Liquid Chromatography Columns and Accessories: What to Know for 2023 - LCGC Chromatography Online
summary: This article provides an overview of new liquid chromatography (LC) columns and accessories released by various vendors in 2023. Many of the new products are based on recent, but established technologies, such as superficially porous particle (SPP) substrates. Many other products are extensions of existing product lines with new surface chemistry or bonding processes. Some product lines are based on inert column hardware, continuing a major trend from last year.

title: LABVOLUTION 2023: A Sneak Peek into the Future of Laboratory Technology - DirectIndustry e-Magazine
summary: The LABVOLUTION trade show will take place in Hannover, Germany from May 9th to May 11th, 2023. The event will focus on digitalization, automation, innovative laboratory technologies and solutions, as well as artificial intelligence and sustainability. Visitors can expect to see new products and services from a variety of companies, including startups.

title: Bisera Lozanovska enters the world of cosmetics and beauty through biochemistry - Fairleigh Dickinson University
summary: Bisera Lozanovska, a recent FDU graduate in biochemistry, has landed a full-time job as a junior cosmetic chemist at Cosmax USA. Lozanovska's interest in cosmetic science began in high school as she looked into different products and ingredients that would be good for her skin. She was able to develop her interest in cosmetic science, test her knowledge in the field and formulate her plans for the future while at FDU.

title: Top 10 Best Speciality Chemicals Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: The Indian speciality chemicals sector is growing rapidly due to the country's expanding economy and favourable government policies. Companies are investing heavily in research and development to gain a competitive edge and meet increasing demand. However, the industry faces challenges such as rising costs of raw materials and shortages of skilled labour.
